summary: A text message from Leon to an unnamed recipient expressing shock and concern over damaging statements allegedly made by the recipient, which Leon claims are untrue and harmful to his reputation. The message requests a call to clarify the situation.

persons.name: Leon
persons.context: Leon is the sender of an iMessage expressing distress over damaging statements allegedly made by the recipient, which he claims are false and harmful to his reputation.

events.title: Damaging statements made
events.description: Statements were allegedly made by an unnamed recipient that Leon claims are untrue and damaging to his reputation.

keyFacts: Leon sent a distressed text message on March 18, 2021, regarding damaging statements allegedly made about him.
Leon claims the statements are untrue and harmful to his reputation.
The recipient of the message is not named, and the nature of the statements is not specified.
